packs.name: Alternate Block Destruction
packs.description: Changes the breaking texture of blocks to a messy ring around the outside

packs.name: Black Nether Bricks
packs.description: Changes the texture of Nether Bricks to make them black

packs.name: Cherry Picking
packs.description: Changes the texture of cake to remove the large cherry in the center

packs.name: Unbundled Hay Bales
packs.description: Gets rid of the red strings around Hay Bales

packs.name: Unbundled Dried Kelp
packs.description: Gets rid of the white strings around Dried Kelp

packs.name: Solid Honey
packs.description: Eliminates Honey Block transparency

packs.name: Solid Slime
packs.description: Eliminates Slime Block transparency

packs.name: Desaturated Resin
packs.description: Desaturates the color of all Resin blocks and items

packs.name: Desaturated Purpur
packs.description: Desaturates the color of all purpur blocks

packs.name: Desaturated Dark Oak
packs.description: Desaturates Dark Oak Planks to give them a more neutral color

packs.name: Horizontal Nuggets
packs.description: Rotates Gold Nuggets to be consistent with the Iron Nugget

packs.name: Vertical Nuggets
packs.description: Rotates the Iron Nugget to be consistent with the Gold Nugget

packs.name: Clean Wool
packs.description: Makes all wool blocks have a clean texture

packs.name: Softer Wool
packs.description: Lowers the contrast and smoothens all wool blocks

packs.name: Brown Leather
packs.description: Recolours all leather related items to use a similar palette to Leather Armor

packs.name: Red Iron Golem Flowers
packs.description: Changes the yellow flowers on the Iron Golem skin to red ones in order to match the poppies that they drop

packs.name: Rename 'Stem' to 'Log'
packs.description: Renames 'Crimson/Warped Stem/Hyphae' to 'Crimson/Warped Log/Wood'

packs.name: Colorful Enchanting Table Particles
packs.description: Makes the particles that come from bookshelves around an Enchanting Table nice and colorful!

packs.name: HD Shield Banner Patterns
packs.description: Swaps out the regular pixel consistent shield banner pattern textures with their regular banner counterparts, so you can see your banner patterns on shields in all their glory

packs.name: Pink End Rods
packs.description: Changes the gray base of End Rods to pink

packs.name: Ashless Campfires
packs.description: Removes the 'ash' from unlit Campfires and Soul Campfires

packs.name: Glass Doors & Trapdoors
packs.description: Adds uniquely shaped glass windows into Doors and Trapdoors

packs.name: Flint Tipped Arrows
packs.description: Changes arrow sprites and entities to have Flint colored tips

packs.name: Splash Bottle o' Enchanting
packs.description: Makes the Bottle o' Enchanting take the same shape as a splash potion

packs.name: 2D Spyglass
packs.description: Removes the 3D model for the handheld Spyglass, using a 2D sprite instead

packs.name: Accurate Spyglass
packs.description: Recolors the Spyglass to use Copper and Amethyst colors, to reflect its crafting recipe

packs.name: Accurate Scaffolding
packs.description: Recolors Scaffolding to use Bamboo and String colors to reflect its crafting recipe

packs.name: Smoother Warped Planks
packs.description: Removes the harsh contrast from Warped Planks

packs.name: Consistent Bamboo Planks
packs.description: Makes Bamboo Planks and Bamboo Mosaics match the textures of the other plank types

packs.name: Alternate Cut Copper
packs.description: Retextures Cut Copper blocks to resemble their look from their first appearence on Minecraft Live

packs.name: Polished Stones to Bricks
packs.description: Retextures Polished Granite, Andesite and Diorite to look like bricks

packs.name: Singular Glazed Terracotta
packs.description: Retextures all Glazed Terracotta blocks to use a single non-rotating design

packs.name: Plain Leather Armor
packs.description: Removes the brown overlay from Leather Armor

packs.name: Golden Crown
packs.description: Retextures the Golden Helmet to look like a crown

packs.name: Classic Style Netherite Armor
packs.description: Netherite armor in the style of the other armors

packs.name: Allay Elytra
packs.description: Changes Elytra to look like Allay wings

packs.name: Vex Elytra
packs.description: Changes Elytra to look like Vex wings

packs.name: Phantom Elytra
packs.description: Changes Elytra to look like Phantom wings

packs.name: Dragon Elytra
packs.description: Changes Elytra to look like Ender Dragon wings

message.text: Selecting any Zombie skins enables randomized variants between them

packs.name: Steve Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like more like Steve

packs.name: Alex Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Alex than Steve

packs.name: Ari Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Ari than Steve

packs.name: Efe Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Efe than Steve

packs.name: Kai Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Kai than Steve

packs.name: Makena Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Makena than Steve

packs.name: Noor Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Noor than Steve

packs.name: Sunny Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Sunny than Steve

packs.name: Zuri Zombies
packs.description: Retextures zombies to look like Zuri than Steve

packs.name: Darker Dark Oak leaves
packs.description: Makes Dark Oak Leaves darker than Oak Leaves

packs.name: Golden Savanna
packs.description: Recolors Savanna biomes to have beautiful golden grass

packs.name: Lush Grass All 'Round!
packs.description: Makes the world use a lush green colormap

packs.name: Alternate Bedrock
packs.description: Retextures bedrock to be closer to deepslate, making it darker and have less contrast

packs.name: Circular Sun and Moon
packs.description: Retextures the sun and moon to be circular

packs.name: Circular Log Tops
packs.description: Tweaks all log and stripped log tops to be circular, including Nether Fungi stems

packs.name: Smoother Oak Log
packs.description: Smoothens the texture of oak logs to make them less sharp

packs.name: Smoother Stones
packs.description: Smoothens the textures of Andesite, Diorite, and Granite to make them less noisy and more tolerable

packs.name: Pebbleless Dirt
packs.description: Gets rid of the pebbles in Dirt, Rooted Dirt, and all Grass Block types

packs.name: Pebbleless Coarse Dirt
packs.description: Gets rid of the pebbles in Coarse Dirt

packs.name: Brighter Nether
packs.description: Brightens the textures of blocks commonly found in the Nether

packs.name: Clearer Water
packs.description: Makes Water clearer

packs.name: Uniform Ores
packs.description: Makes all ores take on the pattern of Diamond Ore

packs.name: Fancy Sunflowers
packs.description: Retextures the heads of Sunflowers to bloom a bit more

packs.name: Shorter Short Grass
packs.description: Makes Short Grass slightly shorter

packs.name: Shorter Tall Grass
packs.description: Makes Tall Grass slightly shorter

packs.name: Whiter Snow
packs.description: Removes the blue tint from snow

packs.name: Lower Grass
packs.description: Lowers the sides of Grass Blocks to provide a smoother and greener landscape

packs.name: Grass Sides
packs.description: Completely covers the sides of Grass Blocks to provide a smoother and greener landscape

packs.name: Lower Mycelium
packs.description: Lowers the sides of Mycelium Blocks to provide a smoother and mushroomier landscape

packs.name: Mycelium Sides
packs.description: Completely covers the sides of Mycelium Blocks to provide a smoother and mushroomier landscape

packs.name: Lower Grass Paths
packs.description: Lowers the sides of Path Blocks to provide a smoother-looking pathway

packs.name: Grass Path Sides
packs.description: Completely covers the sides of Path Blocks to provide a smoother-looking pathway

packs.name: Lower Podzol
packs.description: Lowers the sides of Podzol Blocks to provide a smoother and more consistent landscape

packs.name: Podzol Sides
packs.description: Completely covers the sides of Podzol Blocks to provide a smoother and more consistent landscape

packs.name: Lower Snow
packs.description: Lowers the sides of Grass Blocks to provide a smoother and whiter snowy landscape

packs.name: Snow Sides
packs.description: Completely covers the sides of Grass Blocks to provide a smoother and whiter snowy landscape

packs.name: Lower Crimson Nylium
packs.description: Lowers the sides of Crimson Nylium to provide a smoother and redder landscape

packs.name: Crimson Nylium Sides
packs.description: Completely covers the sides of Crimson Nylium to provide a smoother and redder landscape

packs.name: Lower Warped Nylium
packs.description: Lowers the sides of Warped Nylium to provide a smoother and bluer landscape

packs.name: Warped Nylium Sides
packs.description: Completely covers the sides of Warped Nylium to provide a smoother and bluer landscape

packs.name: Variated Dirt
packs.description: Dirt will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures

packs.name: Variated Grass
packs.description: Grass will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures

packs.name: Variated Cobblestone
packs.description: Cobblestone will be randomized using a selection of 7 textures

packs.name: Variated Moss
packs.description: Randomly rotates Moss Blocks and Moss Carpets (and Pale Moss Blocks and Carpets in 1.21.50+) to break up the ugly grid patterns

packs.name: Variated Bricks
packs.description: Bricks will be randomized using a selection of 7 textures

packs.name: Variated Birch Logs
packs.description: Birch Logs will be randomized using a selection of 6 textures

packs.name: Variated Red Mushroom Blocks
packs.description: Red Mushroom Blocks will be randomized using a selection of 12 textures

packs.name: Variated End Stone
packs.description: End Stone will be randomized using a selection of 5 textures

packs.name: Variated Gravel
packs.description: Gravel will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures

packs.name: Variated Mycelium
packs.description: Mycelium will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures

packs.name: Variated Planks
packs.description: All planks will be randomized using a selection of 6 textures

packs.name: Variated Stone
packs.description: Stone will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures

packs.name: Variated Terracotta
packs.description: Terracotta will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures

packs.name: Variated Unpolished Stones
packs.description: Unpolished Stones will be randomized using a selection of 16 textures

packs.name: Variated Bookshelves
packs.description: Bookshelves will be randomized using a selection of 7 textures

packs.name: Variated Villagers
packs.description: Adds varying skin tones to Villagers depending on their biome. Villagers in colder biomes have lighter skin tones and Villagers in hotter biomes have darker skin tones

packs.name: No Ender Dragon Death Sound
packs.description: Mutes the global Ender Dragon death sound

packs.name: No Wither Spawn Sound
packs.description: Mutes the global Wither spawn sound

packs.name: Ore Borders
packs.description: Places a border around ores for easier visibility within caves

packs.name: Suspicious Sand & Gravel Borders
packs.description: Places a border around Suspicious Sand and Suspicious Gravel for easier visibility

packs.name: Budding Amethyst Borders
packs.description: Places a border around Budding Amethyst blocks for easier visibility within geodes

packs.name: Visual Infested Stone (Items)
packs.description: Adds a border around Infested Stone in the inventory

message.text: This will NOT affect the placed blocks

packs.name: Visual Waxed Copper (Items)
packs.description: Adds a border around Waxed Copper in the inventory

message.text: This will NOT affect the placed blocks

packs.name: Fully Aged Crop Marker
packs.description: Adds an animated glint to all fully developed crops

packs.name: Fully Aged Amethyst Cluster Marker
packs.description: Adds an animated glint to all fully aged amethyst clusters

packs.name: Different Stems
packs.description: Changes Melon and Pumpkin stems to reflect their fruit color

packs.name: Age 25 Kelp
packs.description: Adds flowers to the top of kelp plants when they are fully grown [age=25]

packs.name: Mine Progress Bar
packs.description: Changes the breaking texture of blocks to a clean ring around the outside

packs.name: Hunger Preview
packs.description: Displays Hunger Bar icons on all food names to show how much it will fill you up

packs.name: Music Disc Redstone Level Preview
packs.description: Displays the redstone power level for each music disc in the tooltip

packs.name: Sticky Piston Sides
packs.description: Displays Slime on the sides of Sticky Pistons to allow players to easily differentiate them from regular pistons

packs.name: Directional Hoppers
packs.description: Gives Hoppers arrows on their top and sides to indicate which direction they are facing

packs.name: Directional Observers
packs.description: Gives all sides of the Observer block directional indicators which name updates

packs.name: Clean Redstone Dust
packs.description: Changes the texture of Redstone Dust to a clean solid line

packs.name: Unlit Redstone Ore
packs.description: Makes unlit Redstone Ore use the same palette as unlit Redstone Wire until its lit, when it then returns to its default, bright red colour

packs.name: Visible Tripwires
packs.description: Makes tripwire a bright blue so you can easily see them

packs.name: Compass Lodestone
packs.description: Adds North, East, South and West markings on the sides of the Lodestone, so you can use it as a stationary compass

packs.name: Brewing Guide
packs.description: Adds a cheat sheet to the Brewing Stand interface

packs.name: Arabic Numerals
packs.description: Translates the Roman Numerals for enchantments and potions to Arabic Numerals (I, II, III -> 1, 2, 3)

packs.name: Unobtrusive Rain
packs.description: Reduces the amount of rain particles for easier vision

packs.name: Unobtrusive Snow
packs.description: Reduces the amount of snow particles for easier vision

packs.name: Unobtrusive Particles
packs.description: Makes many particles transparent or hollow for easier vision

packs.name: No Falling Leaf Particles
packs.description: Removes falling leaf particles from all leaf blocks

packs.name: Borderless Glass
packs.description: Gets rid of the border on the edges of Glass to make it cleaner and more transparent

packs.name: Borderless Stained Glass
packs.description: Gets rid of the border on the edges of Stained Glass to make them cleaner and more transparent

packs.name: Borderless Tinted Glass
packs.description: Gets rid of the border on the edges of Tinted Glass to make it cleaner and more transparent

packs.name: Clean Glass
packs.description: Gets rid of the streaks in Glass, making it look cleaner

packs.name: Clean Stained Glass
packs.description: Gets rid of the streaks in Stained Glass, making them look cleaner

packs.name: Clean Tinted Glass
packs.description: Gets rid of the streaks in Tinted Glass, making it look cleaner

packs.name: Unobtrusive Scaffolding
packs.description: Creates a hole in the top of scaffolding, allowing you to traverse up and down them more comfortably

packs.name: Unobtrusive Enchantment Glint
packs.description: Changes the enchantment glint to a much more sleek and less overpowering glint

packs.name: Lower Fire
packs.description: Lowers the height of fire to be 1-block-tall

packs.name: Lower Shield
packs.description: Lowers Shields in the first-person perspective to provide for wider visibility

packs.name: Translucent Pumpkin Overlay
packs.description: Increases visibility when wearing a Pumpkin

packs.name: No Pumpkin Overlay
packs.description: Removes the Pumpkin overlay completely when worn

packs.name: Translucent Spyglass Overlay
packs.description: Increases visibility when zooming in with a Spyglass

packs.name: No Spyglass Overlay
packs.description: Removes the Spyglass overlay completely when zooming in

packs.name: No Vignette
packs.description: Removes the darkened corners of the screen that occur in darker areas when graphics are set to 'fancy'

packs.name: Invisible Totem
packs.description: Renders the Totem of Undying as completely invisible when in first person mode

packs.name: Short Swords
packs.description: Makes the length of all swords shorter for easier visibility

packs.name: 3D Sun & Moon
packs.description: Retextures the Sun and Moon textures to give the illusion of being 3D

packs.name: 3D Mace
packs.description: Remodels the Mace to appear in 3D

packs.name: Dark UI
packs.description: Changes all inventories and UIs to be darker

packs.name: Numbered Hotbar
packs.description: Adds numbers to the hotbar slots

packs.name: Hotbar-Style Inventory Slot Highlight
packs.description: Gives the inventory slot highlight the same texture as the hotbar selection slot

packs.name: Bedrock Edition Title
packs.description: Add a Bedrock Edition Logo to the Minecraft Title

packs.name: Clearer Wither Hearts
packs.description: Makes Hearts more visible when under the 'Wither' effect

packs.name: Rainbow Experience Bar
packs.description: Changes the default green XP bar to a rainbow XP bar

packs.name: Translucent Tooltips
packs.description: Makes item tooltips translucent

packs.name: Trading Helper
packs.description: Makes all locked trades visibles and allows to see the locked item names and enchantments

packs.name: Quick Crafting
packs.description: Adds a button to stack craft items in the inventory, crafting table, stonecutter, and trade faster with villagers

packs.name: Chat Tweaks
packs.description: Allows mobile users to easily tab and move between previous and next messages sent in chat and command blocks

packs.name: No How To Play
packs.description: Removes the 'How to Play' Button from all screens so you do not accidentally misclick it

packs.name: No Crosshair
packs.description: Removes the '+' crosshair

packs.name: Smaller Crosshair
packs.description: Makes the '+' crosshair smaller

packs.name: Dot Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a dot

packs.name: Plus Dot Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a plus with a dot in the middle

packs.name: Circle Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a circle

packs.name: Circle Dot Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a circle with a dot in the middle

packs.name: Square Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a square

packs.name: Square Dot Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a square with a dot in the middle

packs.name: Square Plus Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a square with a plus in the middle

packs.name: Square Plus Dot Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a square with a plus and a dot in the middle

packs.name: 4 Angled Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to 4 lines coming out from the middle

packs.name: 4 Angled Dot Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a dot with 4 lines coming out from the middle

packs.name: Heart Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to a heart

packs.name: Arrow Crosshair
packs.description: Changes the '+' crosshair to an arrow

packs.name: No Panorama Overlay
packs.description: Removes the translucent overlay gradient from the menu panorama if it has one

packs.name: Classic Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with the classic one from before 1.13

packs.name: Ocean Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of the ocean (from 1.13)

packs.name: Village Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of a village (from 1.14)

packs.name: Bees Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of a group of happy bees! (from 1.15)

packs.name: Nether Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of the Nether! (from 1.16)

packs.name: Amethyst Geode Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of an amethyst geode! (from 1.17)

packs.name: Sunset Valley Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of a valley under the setting sun! (from 1.18)

packs.name: Mangrove Swamp Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of a mangrove swamp (from 1.19)

packs.name: Cherry Grove Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of a Cherry Grove (from 1.20)

packs.name: Trial Chamber Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of a Trial Chamber (from 1.21)

packs.name: Pale Garden Panorama
packs.description: Replaces the default Minecraft menu panorama with a 360° view of a Pale Garden (from 1.21.4)

packs.name: The End Panorama

packs.name: English Enchanting Table Translation
packs.description: Changes the Enchanting Table language (AKA Standard Galactic) to use English alphabet characters

message.text: This will not help you with enchanting, as the words and phrases used in the Enchanting Table are completely random gibberish. This pack is purely for fun and aesthetics

packs.name: Standard Galactic Alphabet
packs.description: Changes English alphabet characters to Standard Galactic alphabet characters. (AKA the Enchanting Table language) ∴⍑॥  ↸╎↸ ॥ᒍ⚍ ᒣ∷ᖋリϟ|:ᖋᒣᒷ ᒣ⍑╎ϟ?
